Title: The Vault of Secrets (1)
Plot: Androvax the Veil returns to Earth and asks for the gangs help, but how can they trust him? Or is the threat posed by the Vault of Secrets great enough to overcome old enmities. And when the android guardians threaten destruction, is there really any other choice?
GuestStars: Angus Wright, Mark Goldthorp, Cheryl Campbell, David Webber, Sophie Benjamin, Perry Blank, Mina Anwar, Ace Bhatti
